CarouselItems.Title: Illuvium - Live22 - Casino Slot Game
CarouselItems.ShortDescription: Illuvium is a slotgame based on the NFT game called Illuvium. The more wins you get the more of the slot you open.

CarouselItems.Title: Fortune Realm - Live22 - Casino Slot Game
CarouselItems.ShortDescription: Fortune Realm is a slotgame made around the time for Chinese New Year to celebrate. It features stickies when multiplier objects fall.

CarouselItems.Title: Arcane Sorceress - UUSlots - Casino Slot Game
CarouselItems.ShortDescription: Arcane Sorceress is the first game ever created for UUSlots. It features a dropdown mechanic when you win and the more you win, the more free games you get.

CarouselItems.Title: Venom - EpicWin - Casino Slot Game
CarouselItems.ShortDescription: EpicWin is a slot brand that mostly does games that deal with Movies. Venom, the slot game, has moving wild to improve your chances of winning.

CarouselItems.Title: Santa's Joy - Live22 - Casino Slot Game
CarouselItems.ShortDescription: Santa's Joy is a game made for the Christmas Time. It featured sticky wilds and full reel wilds when playing.

CarouselItems.Title: TheNux - TTwoWeb - CryptoExchangeWallet
CarouselItems.LinkDescription: Download TheNux for your very own crypto wallet.
CarouselItems.ShortDescription: TheNux is a crypto wallet, made for trading, giving, receiving, and exchanging cryptocurrency.

CarouselItems.Title: War Of The Origin - Tris Avior - Mobile Gacha Pinball Game
CarouselItems.ShortDescription: War of the Origin is a pinball game trying to defeat the dyrions by shooting pinballs. Each character has its own quirk with a each different ball.
